a.h1: Crosbyton CISD Home of the Chiefs

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Prom was scheduled for this Saturday. We are going to continue with the crowning of a King and Queen. That announcement will be made here on Facebook at 11:30 pm tomorrow night.
All student course request for the 2020-2021 school year are due by Monday, April 27th at 4:00 pm. On Tuesday, April 28th, student courses will be selected by campus administration.
Should you have any questions about course selection, please contact Mrs. Mason at stmason@crosbyton.k12.tx.us.
Should you need a paper copy, please email Mr. Dominguez at hdominguez@crosbyton.k12.tx.us.

The link below will take you to the course selection page on our website. Once on the website, just click on the grade level that your child will be in next year. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. We are here to help.
Happy Administrative Professionals Day to Mrs. Garcia, Ms. Cantu, Mrs. Palacios, and Ms. Daugherty. We appreciate all that you do for Crosbyton CISD.
Crosbyton CISD's Federal School Report Cards are available for review. These can be accessed under the Links tab of this website. Use the Explore tab above to find the Links tab.

h3.a: Notice Regarding the Refusal of Entry to or Ejection of an Individual from District Property

div.p:
Notice Regarding the Refusal of Entry to or Ejection of an Individual from District Property
(19 T.A.C. 103.1207(g))
In accordance with Education Code 37.105, the Crosbyton CISD has the...
Crosbyton CISD adopted a tax rate that will raise more taxes for maintenance and operations than last year’s tax rate. The tax rate will effectively be raised by 18.82 percent and will raise taxes...
